description:
Perfect paddling pants for warmer weather/water conditions, with a female-specific fit.  We’ve designed them to be teamed up with the Fusion Vest for full core-and-more insulation that's a convenient alternative to a Farmer Jane.The Fusion series combines years of material development with exceptionally sophisticated patterning to produce neoprene that’s more comfortable to wear while you're active, and warmer in the water if you swim.3mm four-way super-stretch neoprene provides maximum comfort, fit, and mobility.High-cut back for coverage when seated.Drawstring on waist.

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering
name: MEC Fusion Neoprene Pants - Women's
